data.title: Azura's Relics in Stormhaven Bugged
data.meta_description: After you run back and forth fetching all the items for that quest, then close the daedric boxes in the towers, your sent to the bottom of the waterfall to use the scroll to see the daedra.
data.text:
After you run back and forth fetching all the items for that quest, then close the daedric boxes in the towers, your sent to the bottom of the waterfall to use the scroll to see the daedra. Spider daedra spawns... mid fight she vanishes. Can not re-summon. Have to abandon and did the whole thing again. Vanished again. Ended up having to wait for someone to show up so it could be burned down in a matter of seconds before it de-spawned again.

I filed a bug report, but posting here for other people to be aware.

"There is no moisture in your angry stares." - Laughs-at-All

"I don't know why I bother guarding you horrible people." - Orama Sadas

"Scales here is about to have a really bad day..." - Valeric

"Just tell me what you're doing here before I turn your heart into a tomato..." - Sereyne

"Break those rocks! Dig those ditches! Why??? Because I want you to!!!" - Ifriz the Unraveller

"There are worse masters than I. Far worse." - Molag Bal

"I humiliated the Daedra in Mehrunes Spite." - You, when turning in a specific Undaunted Daily.

"I'm not finding you very pleasant!" - Adla the Brewer

"Old Ri'hirr likes his birds slow and stupid!" - Old Ri'hirr

"When things get dirty... Oh, I get so flustered." - Meredil the Archivist

"Too many Argonians about these days..." - Davon's Watch Guard (though I think this one has been removed from game)

As of yesterday, I can't even get the spider to spawn, nor could a random guy doing it the same time as me. He said he had gotten it to work in the past but it must have gotten glitched since then. Hung around for thirty minutes to see if anybody else could get it to work but the Vet zones are so deserted i just gave up and went to go kill ogres.

Incidentally, as a former Sorcerer in a different life, I must say it was nice during this quest to be able to summon a Scamp to draw a little fire off me while I dealt with groups of three overpowered enemies at once. I fear that Veteran Rivenspire is going to be a bloodbath and since I am a fan of solo play, I wish ZOS would allow DK's, Templars, and NB's to buy or earn a pet. Even with the nerf, my enemies are growing in strength and number a lot faster than I can increase my skills, level, armor, etc. A pet would help...even a lowly scamp.
